In the [93mstudied[0m [92msystems[0m, a [93mstrong[0m [93mcorrelation[0m between the [93mstabilization[0m [93menergies[0m and the [93mintrinsic[0m [93mactivation[0m [93mbarriers[0m was [93mobserved[0m, [93mone[0m that is not [93mevident[0m when [93mconsidering[0m [93mapparent[0m [93mbarriers[0m. In [92msystems[0m [93mbearing[0m [93mα[0m-[93msubstituents[0m, the [93mpresence[0m of [93msecondary[0m [93mstabilizing[0m [93minteractions[0m, [93mlikely[0m [93minvolving[0m [93mnon[0m-[93mcovalent[0m [93mcontacts[0m between the [93mnucleophile[0m and [93mC[0m-[93mH[0m [93mbonds[0m of the [93melectrophile[0m, [93mmay[0m [93mcontribute[0m to [93mlowering[0m the [93mintrinsic[0m [93mbarrier[0m. [93mTogether[0m, these [93mfindings[0m [93mdemonstrate[0m that [93mboth[0m [93mNBO[0m and [93mQTAIM[0m [93manalyses[0m are [93mrobust[0m [92mtools[0m to [93mdetermine[0m the [93melectronic[0m [93mcontributions[0m that [33mgovern[0m [93mreactivity[0m and [93mselectivity[0m in the [93manalyzed[0m [93mS[0m [93mN[0m [93m2[0m [93mreactions[0m. [93mFurthermore[0m, [93mthey[0m [93mposition[0m [93mhyperconjugation[0m not [93mmerely[0m as a [93mpassive[0m [93mstabilizing[0m [93meffect[0m but [93malso[0m as an [93mactive[0m [93mmodulator[0m [93mcapable[0m of [93mtuning[0m [93mintrinsic[0m [93mreactivity[0m in [93morganic[0m [93mreactions[0m.
- [93mUnderstanding[0m the [93minterfacial[0m [93minteraction[0m [93mcharacteristics[0m of [93masphalt[0m [93mnanocomposites[0m [93mreinforced[0m with [93mdiamond[0m [93mnanothreads[0m and [93mcarbon[0m [93mnanotubes[0m.: [93mDiamond[0m [93mnanothreads[0m ([93mDNTs[0m) and [93mcarbon[0m [93mnanotubes[0m ([93mCNTs[0m) [93mhave[0m [93memerged[0m as [93mpromising[0m [93mreinforcement[0m [93mmaterials[0m for [93masphalt[0m. [93mHowever[0m, the [93minterfacial[0m [93mproperties[0m between [93mDNTs[0m/[93mCNTs[0m and [93masphalt[0m [93mremain[0m [93mpoorly[0m [93munderstood[0m, [93mhindering[0m the [93madvancement[0m of [93mDNT[0m-/[93mCNT[0m-[93mmodified[0m [93masphalt[0m [93mnanocomposites[0m. In this [93mstudy[0m, [93mpullout[0m [93mtests[0m were [93mconducted[0m on [93masphalt[0m [93mnanocomposites[0m [93mreinforced[0m with [93mDNTs[0m, [93mnitrogen[0m-[93mdoped[0m [93mdiamond[0m [93mnanothreads[0m ([93mNDNTs[0m), and [93mCNTs[0m, to [93manalyze[0m the [93mpullout[0m [93mperformance[0m and [93mreinforcing[0m [93mmechanisms[0m [93macross[0m [93mvarious[0m [93mtemperature[0m [93mranges[0m. The [93mfindings[0m [93mreveal[0m that [93mCNT[0m-[93mmodified[0m [93masphalt[0m [93mnanocomposites[0m [93mexhibited[0m [93msuperior[0m [93mpullout[0m [93mperformance[0m [93mcompared[0m to those [93mreinforced[0m with [93mDNTs[0m, [93mprimarily[0m [93mdue[0m to [93mπ[0m-[93mπ[0m [93mstacking[0m [93minteractions[0m that [93mfacilitated[0m the [93mwrapping[0m of [93masphalt[0m [93mmolecules[0m [93maround[0m [93mCNT[0m [93msurfaces[0m. Among the [93mDNT[0m [91mvariants[0m, the [93mDNT2[0m-[93mmodified[0m [93masphalt[0m [93mnanocomposite[0m [93mdemonstrated[0m the [93mhighest[0m [93mpullout[0m [93mperformance[0m, which was [93mattributed[0m to its [93mhelical[0m [93mstructure[0m that [93menhanced[0m [93mmechanical[0m [93minterlocking[0m within the [93masphalt[0m [93mmatrix[0m. [93mNotably[0m, [93mNDNTs[0m [93mshowed[0m the [93mhighest[0m [93mbinding[0m [93menergy[0m [93mrelative[0m to [93mDNTs[0m and [93mCNTs[0m, [93mstemming[0m from [93minteractions[0m between [93mhydroxyl[0m [93mgroups[0m on [93masphaltene[0m-[93mphenol[0m and [93mnitrogen[0m [93matoms[0m on [93mNDNTs[0m, [93mleading[0m to the [93mformation[0m of [93mO[0m-[93mH[0m⋯[93mN[0m [93mhydrogen[0m [93mbonds[0m. [93mDensity[0m [93mfunctional[0m [93mtheory[0m ([93mDFT[0m) [93mcalculations[0m [93mindicated[0m that [93mnitrogen[0m [93mdoping[0m [93mmodified[0m the [93melectronic[0m [93mstructure[0m of [93mNDNTs[0m, [93mresulting[0m in [93mlocalized[0m [93mnegative[0m [93mcharges[0m that [93menhance[0m [93mtheir[0m [93moverall[0m [93melectronegativity[0m.

- [93mKnoevenagel[0m [93mCondensation[0m [93mEnables[0m a [93mHigh[0m-[93mDipole[0m [93mInterfacial[0m [93mMolecule[0m for [93mEfficient[0m [93mWide[0m-[93mBandgap[0m [93mPerovskite[0m and [93mTandem[0m [93mPhotovoltaics[0m.: The [93mrational[0m [93mmolecular[0m [92mdesign[0m of [93minterfacial[0m [93mmodifiers[0m is [93mcritical[0m for [93moptimizing[0m [93mcharge[0m [93mtransport[0m and [93mdefect[0m [93mpassivation[0m in [93mwide[0m-[93mbandgap[0m ([93mWBG[0m) [93mperovskite[0m [93msolar[0m [93mcells[0m ([93mPSCs[0m). [93mHerein[0m, [93mwe[0m [93mintroduce[0m a [93mnovel[0m [93mmultifunctional[0m [93mmolecule[0m, ([93mZ[0m)-[93m4[0m-([93m2[0m-([93m4[0m-[93mbromophenyl[0m)-[93m2[0m-[93mcyanovinyl[0m) [93mphenylamine[0m ([93mBCPA[0m), [93msynthesized[0m [93mvia[0m [93mKnoevenagel[0m [93mcondensation[0m [93mreaction[0m, [93mfeaturing[0m a [93mhighly[0m [93mpolar[0m [92marchitecture[0m with a [93mground[0m-[93mstate[0m [93mdipole[0m [93mmoment[0m of [93m18[0m.[93m16[0m [93mDebye[0m, [93msignificantly[0m [93mexceeding[0m that of the [93mbenchmark[0m [93mMe[0m-[93m4PACz[0m ([93m1[0m.[93m60[0m [93mDebye[0m). This [93mpronounced[0m [93mpolarity[0m [93mstems[0m from a [93msynergistic[0m [93mcombination[0m of an [93melectropositive[0m [93mammonium[0m [93mgroup[0m (─[93mNH[0m [93m3[0m ⁺) and [93melectronegative[0m [93mcyano[0m (─[93mCN[0m) and [93mbromine[0m (─[93mBr[0m) [93msubstituents[0m, which [93mcollectively[0m [93mfoster[0m [93mstrong[0m [93minterfacial[0m [93mdipole[0m-[93msubstrate[0m [93minteractions[0m. The ─[93mCN[0m [93mmoiety[0m [93mcoordinates[0m with [93mNiˣ[0m⁺ in [93mNiO[0m [93mX[0m and [93mPb[0m [93m2[0m ⁺ in [93mperovskites[0m, [93meffectively[0m [93mpassivating[0m [93melectronic[0m [93mdefects[0m and [93mmodulating[0m [93mself[0m-[93massembled[0m [93mmolecules[0m ([93mSAM[0m) [93manchoring[0m. [93mMeanwhile[0m, the ─[93mNH[0m [93m3[0m ⁺ [93mgroup[0m [93mforms[0m [93mstable[0m [93mbonds[0m with [93mperovskite[0m [93mlattice[0m, [93mmodulating[0m [93mcrystal[0m [93mgrowth[0m [93mkinetics[0m, and [93mimproving[0m [93minterfacial[0m [93mcontact[0m.
